abstract: Michael Francis Beauchamp (born 8 March 1981 in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia) is an Australian football (soccer) player who plays for Western Sydney Wanderers as the club's inaugural captain. He was a member of the Australian 2006 World Cup squad.
comment: Michael Francis Beauchamp (born 8 March 1981 in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia) is an Australian football (soccer) player who plays for Western Sydney Wanderers as the club's inaugural captain. He was a member of the Australian 2006 World Cup squad.
